title: Strings - Action Music Loops
description: A collection of a mix of percussion and orchestral string loops, including 20 musical sketches that are perfect for backgrounds, battle and dynamic action scenes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/strings-action-music-loops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fxyz6mu15hfsbl8/MSE%20-%20Strings%20-%20Action%20Music%20Loops_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 20 musical loops in a single 120bpm tempo, with a total duration of over 15 minutes, including 20 music themes with orchestral strings, supplemented by drums and percussion.


All tracks are mixed and mastered with careful use of equalization, compression and saturation.


Use loops as ready-made compositions for gameplay dynamic and fight scenes, upcoming danger scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


You can also divide all completed compositions into bars or beats, and to create ever-changing music and extra variation, you can start your beat from a new place each time. Don't be afraid to experiment.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 20 music loops
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • all tracks in 120bpm
  • 20 orchestral string themes
  • great for dynamic or battle scenes and backgrounds
  • perfect for RPGs, Adventure, Driving, Horror, Strategy, Fighting, and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 15 minutes 28 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
